{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.00611v1", "title": "A new pointwise bound for $3$-torsion of class groups", "summary": "Ellenberg--Venkatesh proved in 2007 that $h_3(d) \ll_\epsilon |d|^{1/3 +
\epsilon}$, where $h_3(d)$ denotes the size of the $3$-torsion of the class
group of $\mathbb{Q}(\sqrt{d})$. We improve this bound to $h_3(d) \ll_\epsilon
|d|^{\kappa + \epsilon}$ with $\kappa \approx 0.3193 \cdots$. We also combine
our methods with work of Heath-Brown--Pierce to give new bounds for average
$\ell$-torsion of real quadratic fields.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-05-01T15:41:30Z"}
